entry.title: Week in Ethereum News August 13, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Mainnet Merge targets September 15, tentative TTD: 58750000000000000000000 TTD to be reconfirmed on next weeks core devs call, 5GB DAG size not expected to cause big drop in hash rate Bellatrix upgrade at epoch: 144896 September 6 11:34:47am UTC Bordel predicts mainnet Merge September 15 Client

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News August 6, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Mainnet Merge TTD & Bellatrix epoch to be set next week on the consensus layer call assuming Goerli merge goes well, Merge TTD will be updated on next core devs call if 5GB DAG size causes a big drop in hashrate Goerli testnet merge: Beacon chain

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News July 30, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Goerli Merge announcement, the final testnet to merge, update your nodes, last chance to practice going through the Merge before mainnet: Goerli beacon chain (Prater) Bellatrix upgrade at epoch 112260 (August 4 12:24PM UTC) Merge Terminal Total Difficulty (TTD) set to 10,790,000 (August 6-12) Execution layer

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News July 23, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Goerli is the final testnet to merge before mainnet, TTD expected August 9-11 Goerli-shadow-fork-5 merged successfully Mainnet-shadow-fork-10 merges July 28 Mainnet execution layer Latest core devs call video. Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim: Node operators need to run both execution & consensus layer clients

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News July 16, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Tentative Merge timeline to turn off PoW in mid to late September:Â Goerli testnet August 11 Pick mainnet TTD in mid-August assuming Goerli successfully merges Mainnet merge lightly penciled in for week of September 19 PoS implementers call video. Notes from Ben Edgington and Christine Kim:
